item.title: Aws Api Gateway Upload File 415 Unsupported Media Type
item.description: aws api gateway upload file 415 Unsupported Media Type 一般情况下，前端向服务端上传文件的方式基本如下： const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("userInfo", …
